* 2 cloves garlic, minced 
* 1 tsp grated fresh ginger 
* 4 hamburger buns

**Savory Soy Balsamic Burgers with a Kick**

Ingredients:

* 85/15 ground beef (or your preferred lean-to-fat ratio)
* 1 tablespoon soy sauce (use a low-sodium version to avoid overpowering the dish)
* 1 teaspoon chili powder (add more or less depending on your desired level of heat)
* 1/2 teaspoon ground mustard (you can use Dijon or whole-grain mustard for added flavor)
* 1/2 teaspoon salt (adjust to taste, considering the soy sauce's salty contribution)
* 1/4 teaspoon black pepper (freshly cracked is best)
* 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar (reduce it to intensify the flavor; see notes)
